description: Jogging in a Madrid park, having a Czech beer, taking a Greek ferry - Europe is opening up more.
title: Coronavirus outbreak: Five ways Europe is easing lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus outbreak: Five ways Europe is easing lockdown - BBC News
maintext: But some parents have said they will keep their children at home as the school year is due to end on 26 June and they do not think it is worth risking infection for a few weeks in the classroom, the BBC's Adam Easton reports.
